name: Crazy Duck Hunter－Just Fire!
description:
This hunter is very crazy,you will not believe.
FEATURES
4 Kinds of Weapons,12 Kinds of Boss Duck.
26 kinds of ducks: Space Duck、Mini duck、Zombie duck、Stealth duck、High-speed duck、Skull duck……
20 Kinds of Maps: "field"、"cemetery"、"Snow"、"Desert",continuously updated...
This game is very easy to play and has a lot of fun. Players just need to click on the screen to start hunting ducks.
